column2: "Mma nntsie atorsɛm: mma nnye omumuyɛfo nndzi nsawosow dɛ ebɛyɛ ɔdasefo ɔkontompɔnyi."
"Mma nndzi ɔdodow ekyir nnkɛyɛ bɔn; nkyii so mma nnkasa asɛm bi mu nnkedzi ɔdodow ekyir nndan atsɛmbu enyi:"
"nkyii so mma nndzi nnkɔ ohianyi afa wɔ n'asɛm mu."
"Sɛ ekɔto wo tamfo ne nantwi anaa n'asoaso dɛ ɔatɔ gon a
column3: fa no san ekyir brɛ no bio."

column2: "Sɛ ihu nyia okyir wo n'asoaso dɛ ɔhyɛ n'adzesoa ase
column3: na nkyɛ ennkɛpɛ dɛ eboa no a
column4: boa na nye no mboa no."

column2: "Mma nndan wo hianyi n'atsɛmbu enyi wɔ n'asɛm mu."
"Twe woho fi atorsɛm ho kɔ ekyirekyir; na mma nnku nyia odzi bem na ɔtsen: osiandɛ murummbu omumuyɛfo bem."
"Na mma nngye akyɛdze: osiandɛ akyɛdze ma hɔn a wɔwɔ enyiwa fura
column3: na ɔkyeakyea atseneneefo nsɛm."

column2: "Na mma nnhaw ɔhɔho: osiandɛ hom nyim ɔhɔho n'akoma
column3: ɔnam dɛ hom yɛɛ ahɔho wɔ Egypt asaase do ntsi."

column2: "Na mfe esia na pe w'asaase do aba
column3: na boaboa no ndɔbaa ano sie:"

column2: "na afe a otsia esuon no dze ma ɔngye n'ahom na ɔnda hɔ kwa; ma wo man mu ehiafo ndzi: na dza wobegya no
column3: hamu abowa ebedzi. Dɛmara na yɛ wo wenyin ture

column2: "Nda esia na fa yɛ w'edwuma
column3: na da a otsia esuon no fa hom: na wo nantwi nye w'asoasopɔnkɔ eenya ahomgye: na w'afonabaa ba
column4: nye ɔhɔho no so eenya ahomgye."

column2: "Na hom nhwɛ yie wɔ ndzɛmba a maka akyerɛ hom nyinara ho: na mma hom mmbobɔ enyame afofor bi dzin
column3: nkyii so mma mma wɔnntse no wɔ w'anomu."

column2: "Mpɛn ebiasa na hyɛ fa ma me wɔ afrenhyia mu."
"Sie epitsi afahyɛ no: nda esuon na dzi epitsi boodoo
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mehyɛɛ wo no
column4: wɔ mber a wɔahyɛ no wɔ bosoom Abib mu no (osiandɛ no mu na ifii Egypt bae); na mma obiara mmfa nsapan mmbefir m'enyim:"

column2: "na otwaber afahyɛ no
column3: w'edwumadze a eyɛ no wɔ haban mu no mu nduadzewakan no: na anoboaboa afahyɛ no wɔ afe no ewiei
column4: aber a eboaboa wo ndwumadze ano fi haban mu no."

column2: "Wo mbanyin nyinara mbefir EWURADZE Nyankopɔn enyim mpɛn ebiasa wɔ afrenhyia mu."
"Mma mmfa mbɔrkaw nnka m'afɔrbɔ bɔgya no ho mmbɔ afɔr; nkyii so mma m'afahyɛ mu seradze no ɔnnko hɔ anadwe nyinara ma onnkodu adzekyee."
"Wo daadze mu nduadzewakan mu kan dze no fa bra EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn fie. Mma nnoa apɔnkyeba wɔ ne na no numfonsu mu."
"Hwɛ
column3: morosoma ɔbɔfo ma oeedzi w'enyim akɔhwɛ wo wɔ ɔkwan no mu
column4: na ɔdze wo ekodu bea a mesiesie no do."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie wɔ no ho
column3: na wontsie ne ndze; mma wonnyi no ebufuw: na ɔnnkɛfa hom mbrato akyɛ hom; osiandɛ me dzin wɔ no mu."

column2: "Na sɛ itsie ne ndze ara ampa
column3: na eyɛ dza meka nyinara a; ɔnodze

column2: "Na mo bɔfoe no bedzi w'enyim akɔ
column3: na ɔdze wo ekodu Amorifo
column8: nye Jebusfo nkyɛn: na mubotwa hɔn egu."

column2: "Mma mmbɔ wo mu adze mma hɔn enyame
column3: na nnsom hɔn
column4: na nnyɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ so: na butuw na butuw hɔn
column5: na bubu hɔn edum mu esinesin."

column2: "Na hom nsom EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column3: na obehyira w'edziban
column4: nye wo nsu do; na mibeyi yarba mefi wo mu."

column2: "Obiara nnkɔpon ɔba
column3: na ɔnnkɛyɛ ɔbɔnyin so
column4: wɔ w'asaase do: mebɛma wo nda no dodow ano edu."

column2: "Mebɛma mo ho hu edzi w'enyim
column3: na mebɛka aman a ebɛba hɔn do nyinara megu
column4: na mama w'atamfo nyinara adan hɔn ekyir ama wo."

column2: "Na mobɔsoma nkotokrodo ma woeedzi w'enyim
column3: apam Hivifo

column2: "Mennkɛpam hɔn wɔ w'enyim wɔ afe kor mu; ɔno bɛyɛ na asaase no adan amamfo
column3: na hamu mbowa adɔɔ so wɔ wo do."

column2: "Nkakrankakra na mebɛpam hɔn wɔ w'enyim
column3: ekodu dɛ ebɔdɔr

column2: "Na mubotwa wo he efi Mbɛw Po no ho araa ekodu Filistiafo po no ho
column3: na medze mefi sar no ano ekodu Esutsen no ho: na mibeyi asaase no do mba mahyɛ wo nsa; na ebɛpam hɔn wɔ w'enyim."

column2: "Mma nnye hɔn nye hɔn enyame so nndzi ahyɛmu."
"Mma wɔnntsena w'asaase do
column3: ɔno bɛyɛ na wɔama ayɛ bɔn etsia me: na sɛ esom hɔn enyame a
